alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 1:37PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph, significantly reducing visibility to near zero. * WHERE...Frank Church Wilderness, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Big Lost Highlands, including but not limited to Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
